Enumeration Type Documentation

enum rbx_SensorType
 

Sensor types.

Enumeration values:
rbxSensorType_ADC  analog-to-digital sensor
rbxSensorType_QUADRATURE  quadrature sensor

Function Documentation

int rbxSensor_getPort (  int  podHandle,
int  sensorId,
int *  port
) 
 

Gets a sensor's physical output port number on the device (one-based).

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the sensor's parent Pod
[in] sensorId the sensor's ID (one-based)
[out] port pointer to an int that receives the sensor's physical port on the device
Returns:
RBX_E_SENSOR_ID_INVALID if the specified sensor ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxSensor_getType (  int  podHandle,
int  sensorId,
enum rbx_SensorType *  type
) 
 

Gets a sensor's type.

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the sensor's parent Pod
[in] sensorId the sensor's ID (one-based)
[out] type pointer to a rbx_SensorType that receives the sensor's type
Returns:
RBX_E_SENSOR_ID_INVALID if the specified sensor ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxSensor_getMod (  int  podHandle,
int  sensorId,
int *  mod
) 
 

Gets a sensor's modification number.

This number is incremented every time the sensor's value changes.

This function is typically used to determine if the sensor's value has changed.

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the sensor's parent Pod
[in] sensorId the sensor's ID (one-based)
[out] mod pointer to an int that receives the sensor's mod
Returns:
RBX_E_SENSOR_ID_INVALID if the specified sensor ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxSensor_getValue (  int  podHandle,
int  sensorId,
int *  sensorVal
) 
 

Gets the value of a sensor.

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the sensor's parent Pod
[in] sensorId the sensor's ID (one-based)
[out] sensorVal pointer to an int that receives the sensor's value
Returns:
RBX_E_SENSOR_ID_INVALID if the specified sensor ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
